thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Athenex Announces First Quarter 2018 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Athenex Announces First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Athenex Inc:
* ATHENEX, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $37.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $35.1 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $100 MILLION TO $125 MILLION * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $112.5 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AND SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS TOTALED $106.5 MILLION AS OF MARCH 31, 2018
* ATHENEX - BELIEVES EXISTING CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS, SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS SUFFICIENT TO FUND OPERATIONS THROUGH ABOUT EARLY-2019
* QTRLY NET LOSS OF $7.3 MILLION COMPARED TO A NET LOSS OF $41.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
